attributes.action: We would like the law to change for cats been killed on the road to be reported
attributes.additional_details: It is already in place for when dogs are hit by vehicles on the road to legal be reported and so with this petition we would like the same rule in place for our cats as they are domestic pets and family too thank you.
attributes.background: We would like to government to consider our petition for all our pet cats across the uk to be recognized been reported when hit by any vehicle on the uk.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Legislate to require drivers to report collisions with cats
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750612
